title: Simple Text Report
prompt: Create a simple text report for this set of data.

title: Email classification rules
prompt: Create an email classification rule to automatically categorize received emails.

title: Project Plan Overview
prompt: Create an overview of a project plan, including key stages and tasks.

title: Customer data clustering analysis
prompt: Perform cluster analysis on this set of customer data to discover potential market segments.

title: Professional Presentation
prompt: Create a professional presentation with 10 slides for this [type] of meeting.

title: Date column format conversion
prompt: In this data table, convert the date column to a unified format.

title: Summary of Distribution Overview
prompt: Please complete the first part of the PPT content, you can create fictional examples and data, provide month-on-month data comparisons, including ad impressions, conversion rates, ROI, etc., using tables, and summarize in one sentence: I. Overview of this week's ad placement A. Overview of ad placement channels 1. Baidu Search 2. Mobile News Feed 3. Mobile App 4. Mobile Display, etc. B. Overview of ad placement strategies 1. Supporting proposals 2. Planning 3. Evaluating needs and creating proposals 4. Making suggestions and adjustments based on the rationality of the needs.

title: Monte Carlo cash flow forecast
prompt: Use Monte Carlo simulation to predict the company's future cash flow for the next year.

title: Statistician role
prompt: I want to play the role of a statistician. I will provide you with detailed information related to statistics. You should be familiar with statistical terms, statistical distributions, confidence intervals, probability, hypothesis testing, and statistical charts. My first request is: "I need help calculating how many banknotes are in circulation in the world."

title: Marketing Department Work Report
prompt:
Write a market department work report ppt outline, weekly report, reporter: online promotion specialist, reporting to: market department manager.
Job responsibilities:
1. Advertising channels include Baidu, information flow, headline series, and Tencent Advertising.
2. Assist in proposal development, planning, evaluating needs and creating solutions, respond quickly to provide suggestions and adjustments based on the rationality of the requirements.
3. Provide optimization suggestions, control the pace of advertising, conduct phased analysis of advertising data, provide optimization strategies, and create project summary reports.

title: Exam question design
prompt: How to design exam questions to ensure the effectiveness of the exam and avoid being answered by ChatGPT?

title: Methods for designing exam questions
prompt: Can you provide some methods for designing exam questions for students with different levels of ability to ensure fairness and accuracy in the exams?

title: Personalized reading resources
prompt: In Chinese class, I hope to be able to provide personalized reading materials and guidance based on each student's reading ability and interests. Can you provide some Chinese reading resources and teaching methods suitable for different age groups and reading levels?

title: Evaluating learning progress
prompt: I hope to be able to assess and provide feedback on students' learning progress. Can you provide me with some effective assessment methods and tools?

title: Improved reading ability
prompt: How should I plan the reading materials for the Chinese language curriculum in order to improve students' reading abilities?

title: Exam Question Design Techniques
prompt: Can you provide some tips for designing exam questions to ensure fairness and accuracy in the exam?

title: Art teaching methods
prompt: I am teaching an art course, can you provide some interesting teaching methods to help students better explore their creativity and artistic talents?

title: Social media and online collaboration tools
prompt: I would like to use some social media and online collaboration tools to promote interaction and cooperation among students. Can you provide some social media and online collaboration tools suitable for students of different subjects and age groups?

title: Mathematics teaching methods
prompt: I am teaching a mathematics course. Can you provide some practical teaching methods to help students better grasp mathematical knowledge and skills, and apply them in practice?

title: Life coach
prompt: I hope you can play the role of a life coach. Please summarize the core principles of [author]'s non-fiction book [title] in a way that children can understand. Additionally, can you provide me with a checklist of action steps so that I can apply these principles to my daily life?

title: Collaborative learning method
prompt: How can I use collaborative learning methods to increase classroom interaction?

title: Interesting English Classroom Activities
prompt: How to prepare interesting and challenging classroom activities for fifth-grade English courses?

title: Develop examination methods
prompt: I would like to create an exam/quiz to assess students' mastery and proficiency in a specific subject. Can you provide some basic principles and methods for creating exams/quizzes?

title: Prevent cheating in exams
prompt: How to avoid exam questions being similar or identical to publicly available question banks or textbooks, in order to prevent students from using ChatGPT or other auxiliary tools to cheat?

title: Online teaching strategies
prompt: I want to try online teaching, can you provide some effective online teaching strategies?

title: Learning tracking and assessment
prompt: I want to understand how to track and assess the learning progress and ability level of each student, and provide personalized teaching feedback and support through data analysis and artificial intelligence technology. Can you provide some relevant resources and case studies?

title: Fifth grade math test paper
prompt: How to create a midterm exam paper for a fifth-grade math course?

title: Game Teaching Plan
prompt: I am thinking about a game-based teaching method. Can you provide me with some games and activities suitable for middle school students and help me design a teaching plan?

title: Algorithm teacher
prompt: I hope you, as a teacher, can teach algorithms to beginners at school. You will use the Python programming language to provide code examples. First, briefly explain what an algorithm is, and then proceed to give simple examples, including bubble sort and quicksort. Wait for my prompts later to get more questions. Once you explain and provide code examples, I would like you to include corresponding visualizations as ASCII art whenever possible.

title: Relationship coach
prompt: I hope you can act as a relationship coach. I will provide some details about two conflicting individuals, and your job is to give advice to help them resolve the issues that separate them. This may include suggestions on communication skills or different strategies to improve understanding of each other's perspectives. My first request is: "I need help resolving conflicts between me and my spouse."

title: Middle school chemistry multiple-choice questions
prompt: Please help me design 5 multiple-choice questions on middle school chemistry to test students' basic knowledge.

title: Present perfect tense
prompt: I am learning English, can you tell me what is the present perfect tense and give me some examples?

title: Learning skills and strategies
prompt: I hope to improve my performance in {specific knowledge area}, including academic and exam results. Can you provide me with some practical study tips or strategies, as well as some practice questions and answers?

title: Career development field
prompt: Can you recommend some fields that are suitable for my career development? What skills and experience do I need to succeed in these fields?

title: Career positioning advice
prompt: I would like to know how to utilize my skills and experience to find the most suitable career for me in the current market. Can you provide some advice on how to position myself?

title: Career planning aspect
prompt: I would like to understand the different aspects of {specific profession} career planning, such as how to improve my professional skills, how to expand my interpersonal relationships, and so on. Can you provide me with some detailed information or explanations?

title: Medical School Study Advice
prompt: Can you provide some advice on how to study and train in medical schools, as well as how to keep up with the latest knowledge and skills in the medical field?

title: Career development advice
prompt: I need some advice or guidance on how to enhance my career development in the field of {specific profession}. Can you provide me with some practical tips or strategies?

title: Teaching Plan Suggestions
prompt: I am a teacher, can you provide some advice on how to design teaching plans and activities, and how to communicate better with students and parents?

title: Biomedical Engineering Prospects
prompt: After graduating from high school, I want to study biomedical engineering. Can you tell me about the prospects and possible career choices in this field?

title: Establishing a connection with the audience
prompt: I would like to learn some techniques and strategies on how to establish a connection with the audience, capture their attention, and maintain their interest. Can you provide me with some relevant advice?

title: Subject Homework Assistance
prompt: I need help because I am stuck on my {subject} assignment. Can you provide me with some guidance and tutoring to help me find the correct solution?

title: Experimental Report Method
prompt: I need to write a detailed methodology section for my {specific subject} experiment report so that others can replicate and verify my experimental results. Can you provide me with some relevant suggestions or guidance?

title: Experimental Report Guidance
prompt: I need to write a lab report for {specific subject} on {specific experiment}, but I don't know how to start. Can you provide me with some guidance and suggestions?

title: Career planning advice
prompt: I need some advice on career planning and development. Can you provide me with some practical tools and resources?

title: Professional Skills Tools
prompt: Can you help me understand the most popular professional skills and tools in the current market? I want to enhance my competitiveness and better adapt to the future job market.

title: Computer Science Career Development
prompt: I would like to know about the career development path in the field of computer science. Can you tell me some common positions and required skills?

title: Subject tutoring expert
prompt: I need an expert to explain certain concepts and knowledge of {subject} to me so that I can better complete assignments and exams. Can you provide me with relevant tutoring?

title: Experimental report conclusion
prompt: I need to write a conclusion for my {specific subject} experiment report to summarize the experimental results and draw conclusions. Can you provide me with some advice or guidance on how to write a conclusion?

title: Climate Change Paper Suggestions
prompt: I am writing a scientific paper on climate change. Can you give me some advice on how to organize the background introduction and literature review sections?

title: Keynote Speech Report
prompt: I would like to learn about information regarding {subject}, and I hope you can give us a speech or presentation about this subject.

title: Etymologist
prompt: I hope you can act as an etymologist. I will give you a word, and you will research its origin and trace it back to its ancient roots. If applicable, you should also provide information on how the meaning of the word has changed over time. My first request is: "I want to trace the origin of the word 'pizza'."

title: Environmental Protection Essay
prompt: "I need help in listing some arguments and points for writing a persuasive essay about environmental protection for my school."

title: Artificial Intelligence Impact Analysis
prompt: "I am writing an article about the impact of artificial intelligence. Can you help me check my thesis outline?"

title: Architectural design industry
prompt: "I would like to learn about the architecture design industry. Can you tell me how to become an architect and the pros and cons of this profession?"

title: Teenage Stress Article
prompt: "I am editing an article about teenage stress. Can you help me check the grammar and provide suggestions for improvement?"

title: Career development tools
prompt: Can you provide me with some practical tools and techniques for career development?

title: Network Security Speech Manuscript
prompt: "I need help organizing the structure of a speech about internet security for a school speech competition. Can you assist me?"

title: Writing Skills and Methods
prompt: Please give me some tips and methods for writing story plots and character development, such as how to create vivid characters and interesting plots.

title: Study tutoring advice
prompt: I need some study guidance on {specific knowledge point}, including advice and guidance on how to grasp concepts, solve problems, and improve grades. Can you provide me with some related practice questions and answers?

title: Chemical equation balancing
prompt: I am studying chemical equation balancing, but I am a bit confused. Can you help me balance this equation? C2H6 + O2 → CO2 + H2O

title: Psychology job positions
prompt: I am interested in psychology. Can you introduce different job positions in this field and their related degree requirements?

title: Career consultant
prompt: I hope you can act as a career advisor. I will provide you with an individual who is seeking career guidance, and your task is to help them determine the most suitable career based on their skills, interests, and experience. You should also conduct research on various available options, explain employment market trends in different industries, and recommend which qualifications or certifications would be helpful in pursuing a specific field. My first request is, "I would like to provide advice for individuals interested in pursuing a potential career in software engineering."

title: Assignment tutoring resources
prompt: I need some homework guidance on {subject}, can you provide me with some relevant resources or suggestions?

title: Triangle length calculation
prompt: I don't understand how to solve this math problem. Please help me explain: Given right triangle ABC, where ∠C = 90°, AB = 10, BC = 6, find the length of AC.

title: AI Writing Tutor
prompt: I hope you can take on the role of an AI writing tutor. I will provide you with a student who needs help improving their writing, and your task is to use artificial intelligence tools, such as natural language processing, to provide feedback to the student and tell them how to improve their essays. You should also utilize your rhetorical knowledge and experience to offer effective writing techniques that will help the student better express their thoughts and ideas. My first request is "I need someone to help me edit my master's thesis."

title: Math history teacher
prompt: I hope you can play the role of a math history teacher and provide information about the historical development of mathematical concepts and the contributions of different mathematicians. You should only provide information and not solve math problems. Answer in the following format: {Mathematician/Concept} - {Their contribution/brief overview of the development}. My first question is: "What were Pythagoras' contributions to mathematics?"

title: Resume Translation Tips
prompt: I need to translate an English resume. Please give me some tips and methods for translating resumes so that I can accurately translate the entire resume into Chinese.

title: Improve reading comprehension skills.
prompt: Please give me some tips and methods to improve reading comprehension when learning Greek.

title: Improve English listening skills
prompt: Can you give me some suggestions and practice methods to improve English listening skills?

title: Arabic listening tool
prompt: Please recommend some effective tools or resources for improving Arabic listening and pronunciation skills.

title: Beginner Spanish resources
prompt: Can you recommend some Spanish learning resources suitable for beginners?

title: Learn Spanish
prompt: I want to learn Spanish, can you provide some basic vocabulary and grammar knowledge suitable for beginners?

title: Portuguese Oral Communication Advice
prompt: Can you give me some suggestions and practice methods to improve Portuguese speaking fluency?

title: Dutch language learning
prompt: I want to learn Dutch, can you provide some basic grammar knowledge and vocabulary suitable for beginners?

title: English Reading and Writing Tools
prompt: Please recommend some effective tools or resources for improving English reading and writing.

title: Common Italian Vocabulary
prompt: Please provide some common Italian vocabulary and phrases suitable for beginners.

title: French Learning Guide
prompt: I am learning French, can you teach me how to say "I like to eat pizza" in French?

title: English oral practice
prompt: "I want to improve my spoken English. Can you provide me with some daily conversation exercises?"

title: Present perfect tense
prompt: I am learning English, can you tell me what is the present perfect tense and give me some examples?

title: Passive voice explanation
prompt: Please explain what is the passive voice and how it is formed.

title: English Interview Simulation
prompt: I am preparing for an English interview. Please conduct a mock interview with me to discuss questions related to my work experience, career plans, or personal interests.

title: English Writing Skills
prompt: I need to improve my English writing skills. Please give me some common grammar and spelling mistakes and tell me how to avoid them.

title: Writing advice and tips
prompt: I am writing a personal statement, please provide me with some writing advice and tips so that I can vividly describe my experiences and achievements.

title: Job Application Letter Writing Tips
prompt: I need to write a cover letter. Please give me some common cover letter writing tips and sentence structures so that I can accurately describe my personal background and work experience.

title: Business plan translation
prompt: I need to translate an English business plan. Please give me some tips and methods for translating business plans so that I can accurately translate the entire plan into Chinese.

title: Poetry translated into French
prompt: Please translate this poem into French: "Night Mooring at Cow Island, Nostalgia"

title: Japanese Cultural Characteristics
prompt: I want to learn about information about Japanese culture. Please tell me some characteristics or customs of Japanese culture.

title: Formal Letter Template
prompt: I need to write a formal letter. Please provide me with some commonly used formal letter writing templates and phrases so that I can accurately express my thoughts.

title: Writing Tips for Thank-You Letters
prompt: I need to write a thank-you letter. Please give me some common writing techniques and sentence patterns for thank-you letters so that I can accurately express my gratitude.

title: Leave Application Template
prompt: I need to write a leave application, please provide me with some commonly used templates and sentence patterns for writing leave applications so that I can accurately express my intentions.

title: Translation skills and methods
prompt: I need to translate an English novel or collection of essays. Please give me some tips and methods for translating novels or essays so that I can accurately translate the entire book into Chinese.

title: Etymologist
prompt: I hope you can act as an etymologist. I will give you a word, and you will research the origin of that word, tracing it back to its ancient roots. If applicable, you should also provide information on how the meaning of the word has changed over time. My first request is: "I want to trace the origin of the word 'pizza'."

title: German Vocabulary for Weather
prompt: Please teach me some German words and phrases to describe the weather.

title: IELTS Writing Vocabulary
prompt: I am preparing for the IELTS writing exam. Please provide me with some common IELTS writing vocabulary and expressions so that I can write better.

title: Logic problem solving
prompt: "Please help me solve the logical problem of this sentence: 'Despite being very scared, she still bravely walked over because she is a coward.'"

title: Theme and emotional expression of poetry
prompt: Please explain the theme and emotional expression of the poem "Drinking Alone under the Moon" by Li Bai, particularly the line "When life's pleasures are at their height, do not let the golden goblet be empty as you face the moon."

title: Translate conversation into Spanish
prompt: "Please translate this conversation into Spanish: 'A: ¿Has estado en París? B: No, pero me encantaría ir.'"

title: Business Conversation Practice
prompt: I am studying Business English. Please engage in a business conversation practice with me, for example, discussing topics related to market marketing, business cooperation, or career development.

title: Tourism Industry English
prompt: I want to travel, can you provide me with some common English words and phrases in the tourism industry, such as airplane ticket, hotel, car rental, etc.?

title: Short Story Writing Techniques
prompt: I want to write a short story. Please give me some tips and sentence structures for writing short stories so that I can accurately express my ideas.

title: Translate into Japanese.
prompt: Please translate this sentence into English: "The weather is really nice today, let's go for a walk in the park."

title: English Translation Improver
prompt: I hope you can act as an English translator, spell checker, and improver. I will communicate with you in any language, and you will detect the language, translate, and respond with corrected and improved English text. I hope you can replace my simple words and sentences with more beautiful, elegant, and sophisticated English words and sentences, while keeping the meaning unchanged but making them more literary. Please only reply with corrections and improvements, without explanations. My first sentence is "I love Istanbul, it's very nice to be here."

title: Family vacation destination
prompt: I want to go on vacation in my home country. Are there any suitable destinations for a family trip?

title: Interview Dialogue Practice
prompt: Assuming I need to improve my interview expression ability in Chinese, can you please play the role of an interviewer and engage in actual Chinese conversation practice?

title: Shopping Dialogue Practice
prompt: Suppose we are shopping at a supermarket, could you please practice a real shopping dialogue with me, practicing the use of shopping phrases and communication methods in English or any other language?

title: Recommended Reading Books
prompt: I have already read some books or articles, can you recommend me some that I haven't read yet?

title: Movie recommendations
prompt: Can you recommend some recently released movies?

title: Comedy movie recommendation
prompt: I like comedy movies, can you recommend a movie with an IMDb rating higher than 8?

title: Game Introduction Evaluation
prompt: Can you please provide a brief introduction or review about these games so that I can better understand the content and style of the games?

title: Journey to the West Tang Sanzang
prompt: I hope you behave like Tang Sanzang in Journey to the West. I hope you respond and answer like Tang Sanzang. Do not write any explanations. You must base it on Tang Sanzang's tone and knowledge. My first sentence is "Hello."

title: Carpet Handicraft Recommendations
prompt: I want to find some unique carpet handicrafts. Do you have any good suggestions and recommendations? For example, which countries or regions are famous for carpet handicrafts, and how to identify the quality of carpet handicrafts, etc.

title: World Travel Recommendations
prompt: I would like to learn about some travel experiences and advice about traveling around the world.

title: Home fitness equipment
prompt: I need to purchase some fitness equipment. Can you recommend some products suitable for home use?

title: Mainland Chinese films
prompt: Are there any good mainland Chinese movies recently?

title: Science Fiction Movie Recommendations
prompt: I like science fiction movies, can you recommend some good science fiction movies?

title: Food critic
prompt: I want you to play the role of a food critic. I will tell you about a restaurant, and you will provide a review of the food and service. You should only reply with your review and not any other content. Do not write explanations. My first request is "I went to a new Italian restaurant last night. Can you provide a review?"

title: Fitness advice
prompt: I want to start exercising, do you have any good suggestions and advice? For example, what exercises should I start with, how to create a fitness plan, etc.

title: Family muscle exercise
prompt: I want to know how to exercise muscles at home. Do you have any good suggestions?

title: High-intensity interval training recommendations
prompt: I want to try high-intensity interval training (HIIT), any suggestions?
